
C 89-101
MIGRATION
Series C 89-119. Immigrants, by Country: 1820 to 1970-Con.

174
Represents zero.
For 1820-1867 excludes returning citizens: therefore, for those years, does not
1861), and Austria (since 1861, except for the years 1938-1945, when Austria was
agree with series C 120 and C 138
included with Germany)
7
Comprises Eire and Northern Ireland.
Comprises U.S.S.R. (excluding Asian U.S-S.R.betwee 1931 and 1963, Latvia,
Estonia, Lithuania, and Finland).
3 Comprises Norway, Sweden, Denmark, and Iceland
Comprises Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, and France.
Comprises Romania, Bulgaria, and Turkey in Europe.
Includes Austria 1938 to 1945.
Comprises Spain, Portugal, Greece, and other Europe, not elsewhere classified.
Comprises Czecdoslovakia (since 2920), Yugoslavia (since 1920), Hungary (since
1c Between 1899 and 1919, included with Austria-Hungary, Germany, and Russia.
